desc: Online classes according to Academic Routine of Saturday will be conducted on Tuesday.
All students are hereby notified that due to an essential seminar for faculty members, all classes will remain suspended from 3 PM today

Games Meet 2024: No matches till April 27, 2024. We all know that our college authority has decided to conduct all classes online till April 27, 2024. Therefore, no match will be played till April 27, 2024. A revised match schedule will be published. Thank you.
